short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you make ethical shopping decisions on the Sainsburys/Tesco/Ocado/.. websites based on data from Ethical Consumer Score Tables

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension gets the latest Score Tables from the Ethical Consumer website and uses the information to highlight products on the Sainsburys/Tesco/Ocado/Asda/Boots/Milk&More website.  Recommended products are coloured green, average products in orange, and those that are not recommended are coloured in red.  

I'm planning on supporting other supermarkets in future - let me know if you have a favourite that I don't support please and I'll pop it at the top of the list!
